title: Lag spikes in some games
body: Been getting lag spikes in some games which have really affected gameplay. At first it starts off fine but later on (especially in fights, my lag sky rockets to 200-400 ping (even as worse as 4000) and i start teleporting. It couldn't be my internet because my speedtest shows normal results during these lag spikes. Anyone else experiencing this?

replies.body:
Riot servers were having a hiccup yesterday and the day before.

Are you still getting the lag now?
